column3: Latest; Phnom Penh : A Chinese man high on drugs began climbing on buildings and threatening to jump at about 9 pm on 11 October 2019
column4: in front of Phnom Penh Airport.------According to people at the scene
column5: the Chinese man first climbed onto a three-story apartment building and stripped to his underwear
column6: screaming and preparing to jump of. Onlookers prepared bedding below to break his fall.------The Royal Gendarmerie’s intervention team took  rescue equipment and removed the unidentified man safely
column7: and sent him to the Phnom Penh Gendarmerie. ------TDN
